properties.name: dataminer.apachejit.issues-path
properties.description: Path to folder containing csv of project issue'

properties.name: dataminer.apachejit.refresh
properties.description: True if dataset should be loaded even if it is already present in db (Even if set to false, csv file will be still parsed and new records will be stored)'

properties.name: dataminer.apachejit.skip-load
properties.description: If true, skips the parsing of csv file, effectively denying the dataset load'

properties.name: dataminer.jira.hostname
properties.description: Name of the Jira API remote host'

properties.name: dataminer.git.hostname
properties.description: remote hostname where repos are downloaded if not available locally'

properties.name: dataminer.git.repos-dir
properties.description: Dir where repos will be stored'

properties.name: dataminer.git.linked-issue-key-regexp
properties.description: Used to extract linked issue key in commit message
